get.description: Returns a list of core objects

parameters.name: context
parameters.description: Scope under which the request is made; determines fields present in response.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Offset the result set by a specific number of pages of results.

parameters.name: per_page
parameters.description: Maximum number of results returned per result set.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Limit results to those matching a string.

get.description: Returns a list of topic-tag objects

id.description: A unique alphanumeric ID for the object.

author.description: The ID for the creator of the object.

link.description: The permalink to this object on the site.

date.description: The human readable date time since item posted

timestamp.description: The date the object was published, in the site's timezone.

status.description: Whether the object has been marked as spam or not.

parent.description: The ID of the parent of the object.

author.description: The ID for the creator of the object.

date.description: The human readable date time since item posted

timestamp.description: The date the object was published, in the site's timezone.

user_count.description: The total count of forum users.

topic_count_hidden.description: The total count of hidden topics.

reply_count_hidden.description: The total count of hidden replies.

topic_tag_count.description: The total count of topic tags.

empty_topic_tag_count.description: The total count of empty topic tags.

hidden_topic_title.description: HTML title of the hidden topic.

hidden_reply_title.description: HTML title of the hidden reply.

slug.description: The permalink to this object on the site.

count.description: The count of posts this tag is associated with.
